article:
of all of the U.S. states and their capitals.]] Washington, D.C. has been the
 capital of the United States since 1800. Eight other cities have served as the
 meeting place for the U.S. Congress and are therefore considered to have once
 been the capital of the United States. In addition, each of the fifty U.S.
 states and the five principal territories of the United States maintains its
 own capital. __TOC__
